author: A2915OVanthonyj
title: Staff courtesy at the Grosvenor -
text:
This is lovely, grand old hotel, architecturally.
But what in fact makes it so good is the courtesy, kindness, professionalism & helpfulness of the staff.
Flawless - and first class.
I've stayed in hotels all over the world.
This place is right up there with the best....
